Hello world and welcome! My name is Alymbek and I am a M.Sc. student in Autonomous Systems. I work currently on my master's thesis.

I am a software developer at Varian Medical Systems developing a distributed machine learning portal for medical researchers. We mainly use AngularJS, Bootstrap, ASP.NET, Python and MySQL.

I love my lovely fiancee, guitars, chess, jogging, football, tennis, winter sports, singing and F.C.Barcelona.
